metadata.Title: CVE-2020-1722 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in all ipa versions 4.x.x through 4.8.0. When sending avery long password (>= 1,000,000 characters) to the server, the passwordhashing process could exhaust memory and CPU leading to a denial of serviceand the website becoming unresponsive. The highest threat from thisvulnerability is to system availability.

criterions.comment: freeipa package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
